DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Trial Valacyclovir Hydrochloride ( 256U87 ) Acyclovir Suppression Anogenital Herpes Infections HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection CD4 count = > 100 cells/mm3 . Documented culture anogenital herpes simplex virus ( HSV ) within last 5 year . History recurrent anogenital HSV infection , recurrence ( without culture ) within 1 year prior study . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Malabsorption vomit would potentially limit retention absorption oral therapy . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Systemic antiherpes medication . Interferon . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History hypersensitivity acyclovir .
